info.name: BioLab — Admin Complete Flow
info.description: Complete Admin flow: Login → User Management → Org Management → RBAC → Catalog Admin → Project Oversight → Invoice Admin → Audit & Compliance → Settings → Logout

request.description: Verify MFA code if mfaRequired=true in login response
Validate current JWT — used by API Gateway
Rotate tokens — old refresh token revoked, new pair issued
Admin creates a new user account
Paginated search by keyword and active status
Retrieve user profile — password hash never exposed
Partial update — only non-null fields applied
Soft delete — sets is_active=false, retained for HIPAA
List all roles including system roles
List all permissions assigned to a role
Assign a role to a user
List all roles assigned to a user
List all roles with permissions (read-only query)
Check if user has a specific role
Revoke a role from a user
Revoke a permission from a role
Admin: list all projects across orgs
View active sessions for a user
Revoke ALL tokens — force logout from all devices

body.raw:
{
  "emailEnabled": true,
  "projectUpdates": true,
  "newMessages": true,
  "invoiceReminders": true,
  "securityAlerts": true,
  "marketing": false
}

request.description: List audit events for a specific user
Data access history for a user
Revoke consent — record retained for audit
Blacklists access token, revokes all refresh tokens
